text: Crystal Gayle (born Brenda Gail Webb, January 9, 1951 in Paintsville, Kentucky) is an American country singer. She had twenty one country hits in the 1970s and 1980s. She is the younger sister of singer Loretta Lynn. Crystal Gayle has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, near Loretta Lynn's star. She is well known for her long hair. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:American country singers Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Indiana Category:Singers from Kentucky
title: Crystal Gayle
